# 顾佳凯的网络日志

> `顾佳凯的网络日志` is a personal technology blog focusing on sharing tech and personal experiences.

## Main Sections

- [Home Page](https://blog.gujiakai.top): Home Page
- [Archive](https://blog.gujiakai.top/archive/): Archive Page
- [Tags](https://blog.gujiakai.top/tags/): Tags Page
- [Til](https://blog.gujiakai.top/til/): Til Page
- [About](https://blog.gujiakai.top/about/): About Page

## Content

- [当大模型开始画答案](https://blog.gujiakai.top/2025/12/when-llms-start-drawing-answers/): 介绍LLM可视化回复的现状。
